feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 06:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
